subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4465, how did it go?
description_text:
Guys, please wait with asking for a review until I receive the product. I have ordered the VAM motors on Dec 6 and am still waiting for them.


Thanks,
Peter

> On 30 Dec 2025, at 14:08, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:
> 
> 
> Hello Peter,
> 
> We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Fervid. flutes9c,     This is the shipping/tracking information.

Thank you, the motors arrived and work, but I ran into a problem, can you please help me?

Dirt Rally 2.0 uses UDP 20777 to send telemetry for SimHub.
Simsonn Manager (v2.1.2) uses UDP 20777 too, so I changed Dirt Rally 2.0's UDP port to 20778 (or anything else).

The problem is, that every time when Simsonn Manager launches, it automatically rewrites the UDP port number in Dirt Rally 2.0's configuration file (hardware_settings_config.xml) back to 20777.

This way, I can't use the Simsonn Manager and SimHub at the same time when running Dirt Rally 2.0.

Can you please tell me, if there's a way to disable in Simsonn Manager this auto-configuration of UDP ports? Or even better: if there's a way to fix Simsonn Manager's UDP port (from 20777 to something else)? I'd need Simsonn Manager for my Plus X pedals and SimHub for the motors.


Thank you in advance!


>

Hi Fervid. flutes9c,  Yes, SimHub and SIMSONN Manager cannot be used at the same time. Also, please uninstall the old version of SIMSONN Manager from your PC, then download and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 from our official website.
